subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets made two comebacks, were on the wrong end of an overturned call at the plate that tied the game, and then surged back in the seventh to retake the lead for good.
snippet: The Mets made two comebacks, were on the wrong end of an overturned call at the plate that tied the game, and then surged back in the seventh to retake the lead for good.
